page.title: 03BROADBRIDGE HEATH INDUSTRY-2
page.content: There are varied opinions on the different aspects of the Broad Oak Estate and the new Laing Houses. The residents who live on the Guildford road next to the Industrial Estate find that their road is much {quieter}and{safer}now that all the traffic is diverted around the by-pass.One of the residents,at first, was not used to the quietness. The manufacture of perfume at the Estate produces an{aroma}which some of the residents object to but some enjoy. The buildings in the Estate{shelter the houses from westerly winds. The lights from the Estate and those from a nearby garage provide{security. One resident complained that there used to be a green field next to her so she is against the new Laing Houses which are now next door. She has applied for a rates reduction.
